name: Gather Spacecraft Design Information
description: Threat actors may gather information about the victim spacecraft's design that can be used for future campaigns or to help perpetuate other techniques. Information about the spacecraft can include software, firmware, encryption type, purpose, as well as various makes and models of subsystems.
tactic_description: Threat actor is trying to gather information about the space system.
full_text: Gather Spacecraft Design Information Threat actors may gather information about the victim spacecraft's design that can be used for future campaigns or to help perpetuate other techniques. Information about the spacecraft can include software, firmware, encryption type, purpose, as well as various makes and models of subsystems. Reconnaissance

name: Theft
description: Threat actors may attempt to steal the data being gathered, processed, and sent from the spacecraft.
tactic_description: Threat actor is trying to manipulate, interrupt, or destroy the space system(s) and/or data.
full_text: Theft Threat actors may attempt to steal the data being gathered, processed, and sent from the spacecraft. Impact
